channel.title: Flowback on Concho Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Flowback on Concho Resources

item.title: Flowback Methods in the Permian
item.description: Methodology Analyze completion filings obtained from NMOCD and data from IHS to gain a better understanding of flowback strategies by our peers. Completion data is from 2017-Current. Highlights Many companies in the Northern Delaware are flowing up 41/2 - 51/2 casing. On the Texas side of the NMTX border, RSP is also utilizing 41/2 casing during flowback.
